mapper.select: select ${vavTableName}.zone_air_flow from ${vavTableName} join ahu1 on ${vavTableName}.ahu1_id = ahu1.ID join seb on seb.ahu1_id = ahu1.ID join common on seb.common_id = common.ID WHERE time between ${start} and ${end};

select ${vavTableName}.zone_temperature from ${vavTableName} join ahu1 on ${vavTableName}.ahu1_id = ahu1.ID join seb on seb.ahu1_id = ahu1.ID join common on seb.common_id = common.ID WHERE time between ${start} and ${end};

select distinct * from ${vavTableName} join ahu1 on ${vavTableName}.ahu1_id = ahu1.ID join seb on seb.ahu1_id = ahu1.ID join common on seb.common_id = common.ID WHERE time between ${start} and ${end};
